tools.output

Class GenericLittleEndianWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.output.GenericLittleEndianWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LittleEndianWriter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PacketLittleEndianWriter

    public class GenericLittleEndianWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements LittleEndianWriter
    Provides a generic writer for little-endian byte sequences
    Author:
    Faythless

      • toByteArray

        public byte[] toByteArray()
        Creates a newly allocated byte array. Its size is the current size of this output stream and the valid contents of the buffer have been copied into it.
        Specified by:
        toByteArray in interface LittleEndianWriter
        Returns:
        the current contents of this output stream, as a byte array.
